mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_menu (role_id, menu_id, id, create_by, create_time, last_update_time, last_update_by, del_flag) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT})
